String.string: Ask Yedwin, Explorer Guild Master of Dragonfall, about the kidnapping.
Wipe out the mekonari hunters and ebonweavers in the Nightwood that are kidnapping people there. (You can use the teleportal in the town to travel to Camp Umbra.)
Bring the Nighteye Talisman to Arshak and tell him that you took care of the kidnappers.
Go to Camp Umbra and inform Arshak about the rituals.
We'll add your bones to the pile!
Volunteering for the ritual? How marvelous!
Search the mekonari templars and dedicants for a key to the altar.
Keep searching for the way to the altar.
Follow the spirit to the altar entrance.
Enter the {@linkcreature:256#1501#teleportal} to the Raven Altar Stop the ritual: timed, 16 minutes Destroy the pillar of blood on the Raven Altar and stop the ritual to awaken Sikander.
Use the {@linkcreature:463#1501#teleportal} to go to Camp Umbra in the Susurrus Woods to tell {@linkcreature:256#1010#Arshak} that you prevented the ritual. Obtain new information about Amena Quatla.
